==Descriptions==
{{Description|A towering peak that also serves as the dwelling of the Scions of the Canopy.<br>Legend has it that the warriors of the Scions of the Canopy, along with one hundred Yumkasaurs, spent a hundred days and a hundred ropes moving the “Obsidian Totem Pole,” the symbol of their faith, to its current location.|[[Expedition]] description}}
